input_email_body:
Subject: Urgent: Dell XPS 13 9310 Laptop Not Powering On

Dear Customer Support Team,

I am reaching out to report a critical issue with the Dell XPS 13 9310 laptop that was purchased recently from your Tech Online Store. It is not powering on, and this is creating a significant disruption as the device is urgently needed for ongoing projects. The laptop is a crucial part of our daily operations, and we are requesting immediate attention to this matter.

The purchase was made under the account number <acc_num>, and the order was delivered on the expected date You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.. However, this issue was encountered straight out of the box. We would appreciate it if you could provide guidance on the next steps or arrange for a replacement or repair at the earliest convenience.

Thank you for your prompt assistance.

Best regards,

<name>
<name@example.com>
<tel_num> My name is Carlos Mendoza.
